item.medieval.challenge_orb.tooltip: Respawns the nearest boss structure on use. Does not work if the structure contains any claimed chunks.
item.medieval.challenge_orb.found: Found structure: %1$s. Click again to regenerate.
item.medieval.town_portal_scroll.cooldow: Town Portal is still on cooldown for %s
item.medieval.town_portal_scroll.tooltip: Channel to teleport to your bed, or to the nearest village if you have no bed. Only works in the Overworld.
item.medieval.town_portal_scroll.wrong_d: This item can only be used in the Overworld
item.medieval.town_portal_scroll.bed_obs: Previous bed was missing or obstructed, teleporting to nearest village.
item.medieval.town_portal_scroll.telepor: No bed found, teleporting to nearby village...
